seoDescription: International Blockchain Olympiad is a multidisciplinary design and building competition. IBCOL 2020 invites students from around the world to solve real-world challenges through decentralised applications.
subHeading: Powering a new generation of humans and stretching across the borders.

section01.title: About the Indian Blockchain Olympiad
section01.contentHTML: The Indian BlockChain OLympiad (IN-BCOL) invites the current and recently graduated students to solve real-world problems using blockchain or distributed ledger technology. The top teams will compete with projects around the world in the International BlockChain OLympiad (IBCOL) to be held at the City University of Hong Kong.

section01.desc1: Solve problems spanning across different landscapes.

section01.desc3: Change your mindset, build something impactful and change the mindset of others.
